subject: jcoverage: GPL Java code coverage tool
msgSnippet: We have just released version 1.0.1 of our GPL Java code coverage tool, which may be of interest to the wider JUnit community. jcoverage uses byte-code
messageBody:
We have just released version 1.0.1 of our GPL Java code coverage tool,
which may be of interest to the wider JUnit community. jcoverage uses
byte-code instrumentation to determine coverage rates at the line and
branch level. jcoverage is available to download from
http://jcoverage.com/. Coverage reports are available in HTML and XML.
For samples of some OSI licensed projects (including JUnit) being run
under jcoverage, please visit: http://jcoverage.com/jcoverage/samples/.

Our GPL source code is available from:
http://jcoverage.com/download/jcoverage.html. You can browse our
source repository via http://jcoverage.bkbits.net/. We welcome,
comments and/or contributions.

jcoverage is also available under a commercial license for the
instrumentation of non-GPL or non-OSI licensed applications.

Regards,
Peter.

--
Peter Morgan
jcoverage ltd
+44 1423 526 426
